sqlMap.select:
select PROCESSMODELID, APP_WAY, POL_NO, MEETING_COUNT, VOTE_NO, APP_TIME, CON_MATTER, SX_APP_TIME, YQ_APP_TIME, DY_APP, DE_APP, HY_ZR_NAME, HY_WY_ONE, HY_WY_TWO, DS_MS_ONE, DS_MS_TWO, SH_ADDR, FX_TYPE, SP_TYPE, YBJ_NUM, HY_SY_JL, PJ_JL, FX_BB, FX_ED, SX_BB, SX_ED, YW_BB, YW_ED, FLOW_ID, TASKNAME,OPTION_NEW from T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFIVE where 1=1
FLOW_ID = #flow_id:VARCHAR#
TASKNAME = #taskName:VARCHAR#

select PROCESSMODELID, APP_WAY, POL_NO, MEETING_COUNT, VOTE_NO, APP_TIME, CON_MATTER, SX_APP_TIME, YQ_APP_TIME, DY_APP, DE_APP, HY_ZR_NAME, HY_WY_ONE, HY_WY_TWO, DS_MS_ONE, DS_MS_TWO, SH_ADDR, FX_TYPE, SP_TYPE, YBJ_NUM, HY_SY_JL, PJ_JL, FX_BB, FX_ED, SX_BB, SX_ED, YW_BB, YW_ED, FLOW_ID, TASKNAME,OPTION_NEW from T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFIVE where PROCESSMODELID = #processModelId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFIVE.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFIVE (PROCESSMODELID, APP_WAY, POL_NO, MEETING_COUNT, VOTE_NO, APP_TIME, CON_MATTER, SX_APP_TIME, YQ_APP_TIME, DY_APP, DE_APP, HY_ZR_NAME, HY_WY_ONE, HY_WY_TWO, DS_MS_ONE, DS_MS_TWO, SH_ADDR, FX_TYPE, SP_TYPE, YBJ_NUM, HY_SY_JL, PJ_JL, FX_BB, FX_ED, SX_BB, SX_ED, YW_BB, YW_ED, FLOW_ID, TASKNAME,OPTION_NEW) values (#processModelId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #appWay:VARCHAR#, #polNo:VARCHAR#, #meetingCount:VARCHAR#, #voteNo:VARCHAR#, #appTime:VARCHAR#, #conMatter:VARCHAR#, #sxAppTime:VARCHAR#, #yqAppTime:VARCHAR#, #dyApp:VARCHAR#, #deApp:VARCHAR#, #hyZrName:VARCHAR#, #hyWyOne:VARCHAR#, #hyWyTwo:VARCHAR#, #dsMsOne:VARCHAR#, #dsMsTwo:VARCHAR#, #shAddr:VARCHAR#, #fxType:VARCHAR#, #spType:VARCHAR#, #ybjNum:VARCHAR#, #hySyJl:VARCHAR#, #pjJl:VARCHAR#, #fxBb:VARCHAR#, #fxEd:VARCHAR#, #sxBb:VARCHAR#, #sxEd:VARCHAR#, #ywBb:VARCHAR#, #ywEd:VARCHAR#, #flowId:VARCHAR#, #taskName:VARCHAR#,#optionNew:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFIVE set APP_WAY = #appWay:VARCHAR#, POL_NO = #polNo:VARCHAR#, MEETING_COUNT = #meetingCount:VARCHAR#, VOTE_NO = #voteNo:VARCHAR#, APP_TIME = #appTime:VARCHAR#, CON_MATTER = #conMatter:VARCHAR#, SX_APP_TIME = #sxAppTime:VARCHAR#, YQ_APP_TIME = #yqAppTime:VARCHAR#, DY_APP = #dyApp:VARCHAR#, DE_APP = #deApp:VARCHAR#, HY_ZR_NAME = #hyZrName:VARCHAR#, HY_WY_ONE = #hyWyOne:VARCHAR#, HY_WY_TWO = #hyWyTwo:VARCHAR#, DS_MS_ONE = #dsMsOne:VARCHAR#, DS_MS_TWO = #dsMsTwo:VARCHAR#, SH_ADDR = #shAddr:VARCHAR#, FX_TYPE = #fxType:VARCHAR#, SP_TYPE = #spType:VARCHAR#, YBJ_NUM = #ybjNum:VARCHAR#, HY_SY_JL = #hySyJl:VARCHAR#, PJ_JL = #pjJl:VARCHAR#, FX_BB = #fxBb:VARCHAR#, FX_ED = #fxEd:VARCHAR#, SX_BB = #sxBb:VARCHAR#, SX_ED = #sxEd:VARCHAR#, YW_BB = #ywBb:VARCHAR#, YW_ED = #ywEd:VARCHAR#, FLOW_ID = #flowId:VARCHAR#, TASKNAME = #taskName:VARCHAR#, OPTION_NEW=#optionNew:VARCHAR# where PROCESSMODELID = #processModelId:DECIMAL#
